Record.ClassificationPath: Virus Diseases/RNA Virus Infections/Mononegavirales Infections/Rhabdoviridae Infections/Ephemeral Fever
Record.Description: An Ephemerovirus infection of cattle caused by bovine ephemeral fever virus (EPHEMERAL FEVER VIRUS, BOVINE). It is characterized by respiratory symptoms, increased oropharyngeal secretions and lacrimation, joint pains, tremor, and stiffness.
